name: STAND! For Families Free of Violence
description: Emergency shelter, counseling, legal advocacy, and family services in Contra Costa
fullDescription: STAND! provides comprehensive family safety services throughout Contra Costa County, including crisis intervention, emergency shelter, counseling, legal services, and prevention education.
whatTheyOffer:
- 24-hour crisis line
- Emergency shelter
- Individual and family counseling
- Legal advocacy
- Support groups
- Youth services
- Prevention education
- Certified batterer intervention program
howToGetIt:
1. Call 24-hour line: 888-215-5555
2. Or text: 925-956-8037
3. Speak with trained advocate
4. Receive safety planning
5. Access shelter and services
6. All services confidential
keywords: STAND, Contra Costa County, crisis line, emergency shelter, family counseling, legal advocacy, youth services, prevention education, 888-215-5555
